title: Andy's Return To Resident Evil Village (Part 4)
description:
After months away somehow some way Andy Cortez has returned to play Resident Evil Village. During our marathon stream on Saturday Andy hopped on with Blessing and Kevin to dive deeper into Resident Evil Village as he gets closer to the end of the game!
